title: Kraken Qualifies for Campus Clash Playoffs
excerpt: After a 2–0 week, UiA Kraken secures a top seed heading into playoffs.
body: UiA Kraken Valorant closed out the Campus Clash regular season with a dominant 2–0 week, locking in a top seed for playoffs.
The team showcased depth across the map pool, with confident showings on Ascent and Lotus and standout performances from StormKraken and RiftTide.
With this result, the squad heads into playoffs with momentum and a clear identity—fast executes, decisive mid-round calling, and sharp fundamentals.
